mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO t_sale_order
id , customer_id , customer_name , merchant_id , merchant_name , out_depot_id , out_depot_name , model , lbx_no , po_no , business_model , delivery_date , code , state , refer_to_order , creater , create_date , auditor , audit_date , modifier , modify_date , remark , total_num , total_amount , in_depot_id , in_depot_name , create_name , audit_name , serve_types , contract_no , inspect_no , customs_no , out_depot_code , in_depot_code , topideal_code , is_same_area , end_date , tallying_unit , destination , country , receiver_name , receiver_address , mail_mode , order_source , own_month , original_out_depot_id , original_out_depot_name , original_out_depot_code , supplier_id , supplier_name , pay_subject , po_date , currency , modifier_username , receive_date , receive_name , receiver , bu_name , bu_id , order_type , pre_sale_order_rel_code , bill_weight , transport , teu , trainNo , carrier , torus_number , outDepot_addr , link_uniue_code , amount_status , adjuster , adjust_date , adjuster_username , amount_confirm_status , amount_confirmer , amount_confirm_username , amount_confirm_date , pay_rules , invoice_no , port_des , pack , box_num , torr_pack_type , out_customs_id , out_customs_code , out_platform_customs , in_customs_id , in_customs_code , in_platform_customs , submiter , submiter_name , submit_date , finance_status , is_generate_declare , payment_terms , trade_terms , approval_no , write_off_status , write_off_date , stock_location_type_id , stock_location_type_name ,
VALUES
#{id} , #{customerId} , #{customerName} , #{merchantId} , #{merchantName} , #{outDepotId} , #{outDepotName} , #{model} , #{lbxNo} , #{poNo} , #{businessModel} , #{deliveryDate} , #{code} , #{state} , #{referToOrder} , #{creater} , #{createDate} , #{auditor} , #{auditDate} , #{modifier} , #{modifyDate} , #{remark} , #{totalNum} , #{totalAmount} , #{inDepotId} , #{inDepotName} , #{createName} , #{auditName} , #{serveTypes} , #{contractNo} , #{inspectNo} , #{customsNo} , #{outDepotCode} , #{inDepotCode} , #{topidealCode} , #{isSameArea} , #{endDate} , #{tallyingUnit} , #{destination} , #{country} , #{receiverName} , #{receiverAddress} , #{mailMode} , #{orderSource} , #{ownMonth} , #{originalOutDepotId} , #{originalOutDepotName} , #{originalOutDepotCode} , #{supplierId} , #{supplierName} , #{paySubject} , #{poDate} , #{currency} , #{modifierUsername} , #{receiveDate} , #{receiveName} , #{receiver} , #{buName} , #{buId} , #{orderType} , #{preSaleOrderRelCode} , #{billWeight} , #{transport} , #{teu} , #{trainno} , #{carrier} , #{torusNumber} , #{outdepotAddr} , #{linkUniueCode} , #{amountStatus} , #{adjuster} , #{adjustDate} , #{adjusterUsername} , #{amountConfirmStatus} , #{amountConfirmer} , #{amountConfirmUsername} , #{amountConfirmDate} , #{payRules} , #{invoiceNo} , #{portDes} , #{pack} , #{boxNum} , #{torrPackType} , #{outCustomsId} , #{outCustomsCode} , #{outPlatformCustoms} , #{inCustomsId} , #{inCustomsCode} , #{inPlatformCustoms} , #{submiter} , #{submiterName} , #{submitDate} , #{financeStatus} , #{isGenerateDeclare} , #{paymentTerms} , #{tradeTerms} , #{approvalNo} , #{writeOffStatus} , #{writeOffDate} , #{stockLocationTypeId} , #{stockLocationTypeName} ,
mapper.delete:
delete from t_sale_order where id in
#{id}
mapper.sql: id, customer_id, customer_name, merchant_id, merchant_name, out_depot_id, out_depot_name, model, lbx_no, po_no, business_model, delivery_date, code, state, refer_to_order, creater, create_date, auditor, audit_date, modifier, modify_date, remark, total_num, total_amount, in_depot_id, in_depot_name, create_name, audit_name, serve_types, contract_no, inspect_no, customs_no, out_depot_code, in_depot_code, topideal_code, is_same_area, end_date, tallying_unit, destination, country, receiver_name, receiver_address, mail_mode, order_source, own_month, original_out_depot_id, original_out_depot_name, original_out_depot_code, supplier_id, supplier_name, pay_subject, po_date, currency, modifier_username, receive_date, receive_name, receiver, bu_name, bu_id, order_type, pre_sale_order_rel_code, bill_weight, transport, teu, trainNo, carrier, torus_number, outDepot_addr, link_uniue_code, amount_status, adjuster, adjust_date, adjuster_username, amount_confirm_status, amount_confirmer, amount_confirm_username, amount_confirm_date, pay_rules, invoice_no, port_des, pack, box_num, torr_pack_type, out_customs_id, out_customs_code, out_platform_customs, in_customs_id, in_customs_code, in_platform_customs, submiter, submiter_name, submit_date, finance_status, is_generate_declare, payment_terms, trade_terms, approval_no, write_off_status, write_off_date, stock_location_type_id, stock_location_type_name
mapper.select:
select s.id,s.audit_date,s.code,s.create_date,s.currency,s.customer_name,s.in_depot_name,s.out_depot_name,s.po_no, s.own_month,s.contract_no,s.tallying_unit,s.state,s.business_model, c.main_id as customer_main_id,c.code as customer_code from t_sale_order s left join st_customer_info c on s.customer_id=c.id
( ( s.create_date >= #{startTime} and s.create_date <= #{endTime} ) or ( s.modify_date >= #{startTime} and s.modify_date <= #{endTime} ) ) and
s.merchant_id= #{merchantId} and s.bu_id in ( SELECT id from st_business_unit WHERE `code` IN ( 'E071100', 'I020300', 'I020200' ) )
order by s.id desc limit #{begin}, #{pageSize}

select count(*) from t_sale_order
( ( create_date >= #{startTime} and create_date <= #{endTime} ) or ( modify_date >= #{startTime} and modify_date <= #{endTime} ) ) and
merchant_id= #{merchantId} and bu_id in ( SELECT id from st_business_unit WHERE `code` IN ( 'E071100', 'I020300', 'I020200' ) )
order by id desc

select t.code,i.goods_name,m.barcode,i.num,i.amount from t_sale_order_item i left join t_sale_order t on i.order_id=t.id left join st_merchandise_info m on i.goods_id=m.id where t.code in
#{code}
